Features.title: Everything you need to create.
Features.subtitle: Powerful tools wrapped in a simple, elegant interface.
Features.infiniteCanvasDesc: Organize your thoughts and generations spatially. No more linear chat constraints.
Features.fastGenerationDesc: Powered by Gemini 3 Pro for lightning fast, high-quality results.
Features.smartEditingDesc: Context-aware editing. Just describe changes naturally.

Pricing.creditPackagesDesc: Purchase additional credits to use our services

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.q1: How does the infinite canvas work?
FAQ.a1: Unlike traditional chat interfaces, BananaCanvas lets you drag, drop, and organize your generations on an infinite whiteboard. This allows for better branching and visual organization of your ideas.
FAQ.q2: Can I use the images commercially?
FAQ.a2: Yes! All images generated on the Pro and Team plans come with a full commercial license.
FAQ.q3: Which AI model do you use?
FAQ.a3: We use the latest Google Gemini 3 Pro models, optimized for high-fidelity image generation and complex instruction following.
FAQ.a4: You can start for free with our Starter plan, which gives you 50 generations per month to test out the platform.
